PATIENT_ID: TEST_BCVI_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-04 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-04 20:10:00
Category I activation for 33-year-old male. High-speed MVC, unrestrained.
Blunt trauma to head and chest. Intubated in field.
Unable to perform full assessment.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-04 20:30:00
CT head obtained: small subdural hemorrhage. No midline shift.
No cervical spine imaging obtained.
No CTA neck ordered.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-04 20:50:00
Examination deferred due to sedation.
No assessment performed.
No cervical spine imaging ordered.
No documentation of cervical risk factors assessed.
Patient in ICU for monitoring.
